hello.text: {i}A red head girl enters in the office, {n}carrying with pain two unconscious bodies, then leaves.{s}

how.name: How are you feeling ?
how.text: {i}They are asleep.{n}You need to wake them up first.{s}

what.name: What is the last thing you remember ?
what.text: The last thing we remember is playing at the concert with Raiko.{n}Where is she ?

what.name: Raiko came back. Ask her what happened.
what.text: {i}She tells you she was having too much fun drumming.{n}She must have electrocuted them by mistake.{s}

scanner.name: Use the lunarian scanner.
scanner.text: {i}Nothing broken but you can find out the damage traces a line,{n}as if something traversed their body.{s}

painkillers.name: Give them some painkillers.
painkillers.text: {i}This should calm them down and make it less painful.{s}

painkillers.name: Give them some painkillers.
painkillers.text: {i}You've already given them some.{n}Some more could be a bad idea seeing their state.{s}

medicine.name: Give them a cure-all
medicine.text: {i}The medicine begins to kick in and wakes them up.{s}

medicine.name: Give them treatment for the electrocution
medicine.text: {i}They seem to respond well to the treatment.{s}
